title: Client wont update *error please check logs*
body:
I just wanted to update and this recent patch will not i get that error.

In my logs this is what the error says:
000011.942| ALWAYS| Riot::RADS::Patching::`anonymous-namespace'::CalculateWorkStep: Starting timing
000011.942|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Patching::`anonymous-namespace'::CalculateWorkStep: 
000030.000|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::MD5Helper::ComputeMD5: Broken pipe
000030.000|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::DoesFileExistWithCorrectMD5: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallShared.cpp(1789): Failed to compute MD5 on 'C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_air_client/releases/0.0.1.215/deploy/anes/LoLNativeExtension.ane'
000030.000|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::`anonymous-namespace'::CalculateWorkStep: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/InstallProjectRelease.cpp(270): Failure while looking for and checking existing file
000030.000| ALWAYS| Riot::RADS::Patching::`anonymous-namespace'::CalculateWorkStep: Completed timing in 18.1 sec
000030.000|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallProjectReleaseImpl::Discover::Discover: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/InstallProjectRelease.cpp(556): Calculate work step failed
000030.000| ALWAYS| The following message is prepared to be sent to dradis:

I just want to play please help :[

replies.body: Your patcher might be having issues scanning your game files resulting from a security setting with your OS.  As a first step, go over each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
